meanings.definition: The 17th century in Italian art and literature.
meanings.sent1: During the seicento, Italian artists created beautiful masterpieces.
meanings.sent2: I studied the seicento period in my art history class.
meanings.sent3: In the seicento, Italian art was as popular as gelato on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: Her writing transported me back to the seicento, where creativity bloomed.
meanings.sent5: The seicento was a time of artistic brilliance and cultural richness.

meanings.definition: A painting or piece of music from the 17th century in Italy.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a stunning seicento painting by an Italian artist.
meanings.sent2: The seicento music filled the room with its melodious tunes.
meanings.sent3: I felt like I was in the seicento when I listened to the old Italian music.
meanings.sent4: The seicento painting was a window to the past, capturing the essence of the era.
meanings.sent5: The seicento artwork was a treasure trove of historical beauty.
